document.full_text: squonk opera of pittsburgh helped algonquin arts theater in manasquan develop a show to shake off the stigma the town seemed to feel from the mtv reality show.
document.title: spotlight | manasquan: a town's self-image gets a theatrical lift
lines_and_colors: squonk opera of pittsburgh helped algonquin arts theater in manasquan develop a show to shake off the stigma the town seemed to feel from the mtv reality show.
